DOC.brief_summary: This study compare IV ( intravenous ) versus oral ( PO ) acetaminophen postoperative pain schedule , elective Cesarean delivery . All patient receive standardize spinal anesthetic operative anesthesia randomize one three group : ( group 1 ) 1 gram IV acetaminophen every 8 hour three dos , ( group 2 ) 1 gram oral acetaminophen every 8 hour three dos , ( group 3 ) acetaminophen . This randomized , open label study .
DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Versus Oral Acetaminophen Postoperative Pain Control After Cesarean Delivery
